message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product.  I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $20,000 for it. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I understand its value, but I'm only able to offer $15,000 for it. Looking forward to your response.
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I appreciate your understanding of the product's value.  I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $18,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your flexibility. I am still unable to meet you halfway, but I can offer $16,000 for the product.
